text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing well even though it's early. How are you?
I am alright, thank you. Do you donate at all?
I do when I can. I don't always have extra money to give but even a dollar helps right?
you bet. I am in the same boat. even cents can make a different tho. I did the math earlier, and if every person in the US were to give a nickel, that would be over 16 million!
That's a lot of money
that is right. Have you heard of Save the Children?
I have, but I don't know much about it. I assume the obvious though
haha pretty much. its an organization that helps raise money for children from around the world so that they may have a future
Do you donate to them when you can? I donate to animal rescue when I can.
Like you said, I try to when I can. I try to volunteer. But if we could all get on board of donating just a few cents, we could be raising so much money for these kids
This is true. I feel bad for children that grow up with nothing. It's not their fault for one reason or another
I wholeheartedly agree. They deserve to have a future
Even here locally they talk about how kids in school only get one meal per day. It's sad.
Oh, I know. that is why volunteering is helpful and donating used goods to your local charities. but save the children can help to. It's all children
I don't think there is anything locally to help this particular group. I will have to look into it.
the website is  URL  And you can donate just a few cents today after we finish!
Okay. I will do that.
That is excellent! How much would you like to donate today?
I'll donate $1
